Title: Enacts the "gas tax holiday act of 2023"
Summary: Enacts the "gas tax holiday act of 2023"; provides that from the first of the month after the effective date of the section until December 31, 2023 the taxes imposed on retail sales of fuel gas, motor fuel and diesel motor fuel shall be exempt from certain taxes.
LawCode: Add ยง48, amd ยง1817, Tax L; amd ยง89-b, St Fin L; amd ยง392-i, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the state finance law, and the general business law, in relation to enacting the "gas tax holiday act of 2023"
